akn:section.akn:heading: Sense of Congress regarding permanent, pro-growth fiscal reforms

akn:content.akn:p: § 2241. Sense of Congress regarding permanent, pro-growth fiscal reforms It is the sense of the Congress that any durable solution for Puerto Rico’s fiscal and economic crisis should include permanent, pro-growth fiscal reforms that feature, among other elements, a free flow of capital between possessions of the United States and the rest of the United States. (Pub. L. 114–187, title VII, § 701, June 30, 2016, 130 Stat. 610.)
